title: I HAVE TO REINSTALL LEAGUE EVERYTIME I WANT TO PLAY WTF??? (reconnect button of death solved?)
body:
SO YOUR BIG IDEA IS IM NOT ALLOWED TO CLOSE THE LEAGUE CLIENT OR ELSE YOU GIVE ME A MESSAGE SAYING YOU CHANGED MY SETTINGS AND NOW I CAN ONLY GET THROUGH CHAMP SELECT AND NEVER SEEING THE LOADING SCREEN JUST A RECONNECT BUTTON AFTER TRYING TO START A GAME AND IT DOES NOT WORK AGAIN!!!!

Seriously, I download game, play 4 matches, close client, open client later and it said my settings have been changed due to my computer specs, got the no loading screen issue, SPENT 4 HOURS TRYING TO FIX IT BEFORE REINSTALLING, worked perfectly, now after I closed and reopened my client again you give me the SAME DAMN MESSAGE AND NOW IM STARING AT A RECONNECT BUTTON.



MY COMPUTER IS FINE STOP FUCKING WITH ME AND THE PEOPLE WHO IM TRYING TO PLAY WITH?

Is there a way I can stop riot from %%%%ing on my computer and leave me alone? I tried changing my settings back to default but that didnt work so clearly something internal changed.


Does anyone know exactly what files / options are changing when this happens so I can make a copy of them and switch them back whenever riot feels like fucking me?


AND YES THIS MAY BE A POSSIBLE REASON FOR THE RECONNECT BUTTON OF DEATH, ITS NOT ALWAYS YOUR NETWORK!

IT CAN BE YOUR CLIENT!!!

Sorry for the unreadable caps rant, I`m actually triggered harder than a feminist on father`s day during trump`s inauguration into office.

replies.body:
Sounds like a pretty strange issue, I would be frustrated too.  :(  Are you running League from an external or thumb drive?  If League isn't stored in your primary internal drive then the patcher will rescan for game files each time it's launched, and re-download them all over again every time it's opened.  If that's the case, downloading to your internal primary should fix this up.  

Otherwise, toss me some more details to get a better image of what's happening.  Any screen shots, specifics of what the error says, and when it's happening can help.  Let me know.

If that's the case, downloading to your internal primary should fix this up.  
> 
> Otherwise, toss me some more details to get a better image of what's happening.  Any screen shots, specifics of what the error says, and when it's happening can help.  Let me know.

League is stored on my primary internal drive.


There is no apparent error notification.

 When I open the client to login screen I get a message saying that the client detected that my computer has low specs and I have been provided additional options along with some of my settings being changed automatically. 

At least that is a general summary of the message, not leaving out any important details... I just dont know it exactly word for word.

The only settings that I have found to be changed is the "close client during game" and "enable low specs mode"


Now...based on the option saying close client during game...well my in game client is closing everytime it starts up and I`m always looking at a reconnect button without even getting a glimpse of the loading screen, just the afterimage of something going into full screen and quickly being closed.


There may or may not be correlation between this option and the ingame client force closing, its turned off for me now but so far I have issues as long as its been enabled atleast once.


Thanks for the quick response.


Also last bit of info that you are gonna have to trust me on..... just to save you from having to ask due to the nature of your job.

I have changed nothing with my network, I have changed nothing with my pc, I have not tampered with anything, my network is fine, Ping testing reveals no issues. I have followed through the riot trouble shoot guides for networking issues the first time I had this problem (hence the 4 hours spent trying to fix this)......and so far only deleting the game entirely and reinstalling has worked. I am now insisting that something within my client`s files are changing when I receive this pop-up that originated from my client.

Thanks for your detailed info here.  Not gonna lie, I've seen a lot of tech issues reported here but this one is new.  I asked asked our tech guys as well and the notifications that you're getting are strange as well as your case in general.  We believe there might be some third party app or anti-virus getting in the way, but we want to investigate a bit more.  For example, some security software could be kicking in when you close and re-open the client.  

When you get a chance help us dig into this with you by grabbing logs with the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367).  Submit them to a [ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and we'll work with you directly on this.  Hang in there, we'll get it figured out.

Considering the situation I feel rather silly,  even with the weird coincidences, thankyou for taking the time to read and even relay this to another individual, it was apparently a virus protection program that for some reason did not recognize the league in game client as harmful until my out of game client was closed and reopened, my bad, riot has a clean slate...I feel as wrong as a person who decorates for christmas before thanksgiving.
